website_summaries.verdict: While a few of the pieces are very small and may get lost, the light-up brick and ease of building make this a hit with kids.
pros: Users can build any of 3 types of robots
Battery-powered light brick is a hit with kids
Most kids can put together a robot in about 30 minutes with instructions
cons: Some very tiny pieces mean younger kids need to be assisted by adults

website_summaries.verdict: The reasonable price and versatile capabilities that this set offer make it the perfect choice for LEGO fans and parents on a budget.
pros: An affordable kit that's part of the LEGO Creator 3 in 1 series that allows kids to assemble the robot into a dog, bird, or robot explorer
Has working lights and numerous moving parts
Challenging yet suitable for kids of various ages
cons: A few reports of missing pieces, including one of the main components

customer_reviews.title: Favorite LEGO set yet!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really a big fan of the LEGO Creator sets. If your kiddo is bored with traditional LEGO sets this is your solution. This is by far one of the coolest LEGO projects my son has done. I wouldn’t say this is necessarily more advanced, just a different challenge. My son is 5 and knocked this out in an hr without any assistance so if you have a little one, have no fear.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the Son of Johnny 5
customer_reviews.text: I saw this kit and I HAD TO HAVE IT. I'm an adult fan of LEGO (I find building kits extremely relaxing), but I also have a mild obsession with funky robots. Both of those worlds coming together in one kit for under $20?! Shut up and take my money! This little guy looks like he could be the son of Johnny 5 from "Short Circuit". There's some great pieces here and the light brick is an awesome touch, but I doubt I'll be taking him apart, because he just looks too good in my office with all of my other robot toys.
customer_reviews.author: K.L.C

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: It’s much bigger than expected! The light brick is especially cool in the dark! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coolest Lego set!
customer_reviews.text: My son really wanted the Lego Boost robot with programming, but I was not so keen to dish out the $160 to get it for him. We ended up getting this one as a consolation gift, and he loved it! Of course, it's not programmable, but the parts still move manually. It's the coolest Lego set we've owned so far (and we have quite a few!)!!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson is eight and he put this lego together really fast. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces!
customer_reviews.text: It was missing pieces! The robot was not able to be made. Then, due to the tears, I spent an hour sifting through old legos trying unsuccessfully to find a replacement piece. First time I’ve ever had a problem with a LEGO purchase
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the price
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected but my 7 year old can do it. Very happy with the price too
customer_reviews.author: BigMontana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My son still continuously has a blast building all of these tearing them apart and rebuilding the different ones. The directions are clear and easy is perfect for his age range and he can build all of them with ease. My husband gets a kick out of the fact it's a rip-off of Johnny 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego Robot
customer_reviews.text: Really cute lego robot for ages 6-12 with moving treads, It really does have a light that you can turn on and off so children love to play with it. Not the most impressive robot, but it does work and goes together quickly for target age group. My grandson takes his lego figures apart after building them so this is an inexpensive little robot that kept him entertained for months. With experence of putting lego figures together, six year old children can put this one together and have a lot of fun. The treads are cheaply built and will come off if you treat the robot roughly but they do work.
customer_reviews.author: Im Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Dead battery sucks for 7 yr old birthday!
customer_reviews.text: This Lego set was assembled all the way to page 35, when I discovered the light up brick didn't work, my husband is an electrician, put a meter to the battery, it was dead, your associate said I should have returned it, after building to page 35!!! I said you should pay for the battery I had to buy to replace it, she said that's not gonna happen! Never again will I buy Legos from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: pat pjura

customer_reviews.title: ... son says he rates it 5 stars because it’s cool and can change into different
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son says he rates it 5 stars because it’s cool and can change into different things
customer_reviews.author: Nadja Conner

customer_reviews.title: I love this one!
customer_reviews.text: It was so fun to build the robot explorer and it sits on my desk! I built this several months ago. I remember from reading the other reviews that a piece was missing so I was prepared and make sure I use the one piece I was short of to connect an important part but it did not prevent me from finishing it. This is a 3 in one kit which means I would have to take it apart and build the other two at least once each and then go back and rebuild the robot explorer again. Fun and easy to build and I don’t mine as that is what Lego is all about.
customer_reviews.author: TIGER2

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use....
customer_reviews.text: Pricepoint is similar to any brick and mortar store. My son is 7 and had little struggle assembling the 3 different things that are robot based. He really enjoyed the LED light that this particular unit employs and is semi-unique to this set of legos. Overall I am very happy with this Lego set. Hardest struggle is keeping the various sets separate so he can continue to have fun creating the different things from within this particular set.
customer_reviews.author: California Phantom

customer_reviews.title: It's ok...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little set, but it never got played with after the first build and the tracks fell apart easily. Ultimately it's a good build to get their minds working, but lacks storyline integration with their other toys and Lego sets. What does it do besides wheel around, point and shine a light at things? My kids got bored with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kajean Secord-Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a shared activity with kids
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for a shared activity with kids. I bought one at Target, and several children I work with saw it in various stages of constuction, and said they wished they could try it. Sooo, of course, I bought two more through Amazon, and we are currently creating the bird thingamijiggy and the dog creature. :)
customer_reviews.author: M. Nickle

customer_reviews.title: That if the pieces are out on the ground, wear shoes. It's like a mine field!
customer_reviews.text: I hated this thing when I first unwrapped it. Millions of tiny little pieces. But I got it for my 5 yr old grandson but my 10 yr old grandson plays with it more! And you can build other things than just the robot. He had it into a car the other day, but it looks like a lunar module. Fantastic for their imaginations!
customer_reviews.author: kruthe62

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had a missing part that connected the head to the rest of the body.
customer_reviews.author: PhotographerTexas

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift. We have given it and even double received it, and it was still fun to rebuild. That one little light piece was highly coveted and made a big impression. Little brother slept with that part for a few nights.
customer_reviews.author: Madame Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Truly great set!
customer_reviews.text: This set has a lot of cool and unique pieces for the price and the main robot that it makes is even cuter and more awesome than it looks in the picture! If you are reading reviews because you are on the fence: as a LEGO mom of almost-18 years, I wholeheartedly suggest that you buy this set; it is probably the best of the smaller sets that we have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, nice finished product toy, a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a cool Lego item...you have a small mechanized robot when complete, maybe the height of an adult hand. My son received as a 9th birthday gift, he loved assembling it & did so independently. His party was robot themed so this was perfect. He enjoys playing with it and keeping it on his desk. Friends are impressed that he built it. Getting another for different kid’s birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: brollyhock

customer_reviews.title: An Awesome Lego Robot For Any Equally Awesome Lego Enthusiast Or Collector
customer_reviews.text: This set blew me away with how much it reminded me of some of the robot toys I used to have as a kid. I love the new and unique color that they gave to this robot. I love each detail on this small but very functional robot set. The wheels can be pushed and roll around with ease, the head turns, the arms turn, and the hand can actually pick things up. I really love the Lego Creator sets because they inspire creativity by giving you several different options that you can make (with or without instructions). I definitely recommend you check out this fun-sized and affordable set. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brett TTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Lego Toys Build Creativity!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this lego toy to my 4 year old grandson for Xmas. Even though the stated age for this is 7-12, if your child or grandchild is ahead of the curve, this is an exceptional toy. He was very excited when he opened his gift and Lego toys are great for children, even adults. Build their creativity, give this toy a chance.
customer_reviews.author: catchatter 7

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: This was so disappointing! My 9 year old nephew was so excited to get this. The pieces you have to remove from hard plastic. It hurts fingers to remove. The instructions were AWFUL. He put it in a bag and was sad. Don’t recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bezz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This lego set was missing one piece--the piece that attaches the head. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: kristen m.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Sent as a gift to my daughters pen pal and friend. He’s 8 and enjoyed this set. He loved the light and the articulating parts. He seemed to think the build was easy, but fun. I would definitely buy this cute set again.
customer_reviews.author: Adam & Karyssa Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has made all three robots and loves doing it.
customer_reviews.author: dbsch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute and easy to put together. One of my grandsons favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sanders

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool set of Legos, my 9 year old loves this! He put it together fine and likes that it can roll and lights up. He made it into the robot and things it is so awesome that he hasn't turned it into the other things yet.
customer_reviews.author: jcbm78

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Kids and Adults!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a toy for my nephew and he loved it. I even played with it and I loved it. Such a fun toy. Can never go wrong with Legos!
customer_reviews.author: Mike11058

customer_reviews.title: Fun, cooperative activity for me and my seven-year old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I had so much fun putting these characters together. The instructions were easy enough for me, but they were a little tough for her because sometimes you had to rotate the piece before putting another piece on, and sometimes there are only slight differences in between pieces, so she would get them confused. But she’s only seven, so it’s forgivable. This definitely works best with those who would have good attention to detail. So it is definitely a great activity for both the parent and child together.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a 9 YO
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a 9 YO interested in science. I gave it to my nephew for Christmas, he put it together and he loves changing things around. Delivered on time, not damaged and in new packaging.
customer_reviews.author: RedJ3di

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego Set, Great Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: i have bought this for my kiddo, and at least 3 other times for birthday presents they have been invited to. It is always a well received gift. It is a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: spg

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 6yo daughter and she loves it. She can do most of it by herself. I like the Creator series as it has 3 different models to build.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 5 year old son who enjoys building Legos. He has worked on other lego sets for ages 7+. This one was more challenging for my son to assemble. the tracks for the robot are a bit fragile. Overall it is a nice set and clear instructions to follow. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L W

customer_reviews.title: Favorite gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson just turned 10. Out of his pile of gifts, this is the one he picked to play with first. He loved it. It's sitting on the dining table now, because he doesn't want to put it up!
customer_reviews.author: Resz

customer_reviews.title: Nice Working Robot
customer_reviews.text: Great lego project for my 9 year old who loves to build and tinker. She put it together pretty fast, but she loves it and plays with it. The light works too--nice detail.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Harvey

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was already put together. So I ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was already put together. So I was unhappy that all those little pieces are all over the floor. But it's LEGOs, that's what it is all about.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B

customer_reviews.title: My sons like this a lot
customer_reviews.text: My sons both received one each of this LEGO Robot toy. They both had fun putting it together. They like the tracks and flexibility of the toy. It was a bit of work to put it together but not anything more than a typical LEGO build. It's sturdy and stays together well. Fun for them to play with.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Put this together in about 1/2 hour, kids will take longer but they will love how many moves this robot can make. The treads really work, so it really can just be pushed along like a real toy robot! And the flashlight is the icing on the cake!
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Small

customer_reviews.title: It's a Hit!!
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson really enjoys this particular set of Legos!! It allows him to deviate from the instructions and explore new ways to build robots!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great for mailing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two. One arrived more damaged than the other but both arrived less than new. If you are going to gift this item, realize that the box will show some damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. They think its a transformer and keep wanting to change it to the various different options in the book. I have thought of getting another just to have it in various forms. I will admit it is not as sturdy as some of the other lego sets i have put together with my kids, but it might just be the fact that this is a large robot that my kids play with as such not a lego building that the kids play on.
customer_reviews.author: christopher williams

customer_reviews.title: Lego
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 7 year old. He loved it! Reasonable price; quality building. The directions were easy for child to follow. Also like that it lights up without any special technology.
customer_reviews.author: Racquel

customer_reviews.title: Fun set
customer_reviews.text: The robot is the best of the three builds available here but it still a fun set to own. Battery powered light is a nice touch. Usual high quality from LEGO and good value for the twelve dollars I spent
customer_reviews.author: J. Wylie

customer_reviews.title: so amazing
customer_reviews.text: This toy is amazing.Many parts can be active.There is a part that can also emit light.The most important thing is that you can change three modes.Really good design!!!
customer_reviews.author: qinxiaoyang

customer_reviews.title: Grandson thought it was super
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old grandson requested this for his upcoming birthday. He thought it was pretty super and was very happy to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Crist

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Lego quality and good instructions make this an excellent project for an adult with a 6 year old. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Haven

customer_reviews.title: Fun little set..the light is a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Fun little set for my lego-loving son. Much cheaper than the real Wall-E set, and he really likes the light and that it can be rebuilt into 2 other sets.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Rod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of my son's favorite lego sets. The light brick is really fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ouns Mouri

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than picture suggests. Not functional except for lights. My boys have not picked this up since Christmas day!
customer_reviews.author: MelB

customer_reviews.title: Good item to build, hours of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived damaged, item inside ok. Seems like good Lego find for the money. As little difficult for 7yr but his 10yr old siblings helped him out. Alot of fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Fort

customer_reviews.title: Cool Robot
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this robot. The light up arm is a pretty neat feature. It's worth noting that the tracks on this thing come in 40 separate pieces that have to be clipped together.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Forshee

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4 year old- yes he was too young for the toy but we helped him in the process. Just have to be patient. He loves legos.
customer_reviews.author: Gisela

customer_reviews.title: Nice 1st robot
customer_reviews.text: Daughter enjoys was a Christmas present...limited use or functionality but cute...would recommend for ages 2-9yrs
customer_reviews.author: Kittens07

customer_reviews.title: Original packaging and product. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Authentic LEGO in original packaging. Good product that my little guy loved. Amazon’s great prices mean more fun for less money than the box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Rich M.

customer_reviews.title: Great For Kids
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my newphew as a gift and he LOVED it. He put it together and really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Evans

customer_reviews.title: My grandson is loves putting things together and was happy with this gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my grandson. It really caught my eye knowing he would like it. I have not actually seen it in front of me but a picture was sent to me when he had it together and he was playing with it and his other legos.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Peterson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LEGO TOY
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 6 yr old grandson for Christmas. He had this Lego robot put together in no time and is still playing with it after a month!
customer_reviews.author: GZ

customer_reviews.title: Fun set with unique pieces
customer_reviews.text: Best LEGO creator set we have found. Our son followed the instructions and built the different models. However he keeps going back to the pieces feom this set to build new things using the treads or the claw or the light up brick. Very versatile beyond the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Beckmann

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandsons 7th birthday and he loved it. He said it was fun to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: sparks

customer_reviews.title: Wrong set
customer_reviews.text: I got the wrong lego set, but by the time I realized it, it was too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Son loves this robot
customer_reviews.text: This is our first Creator set. My son loves the idea you pick which one you want to build. We will be buying more creator sets.
customer_reviews.author: Murph

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: A gift that has been played with many times. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Robb

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: 7-8 Year old loves legos and loved this for the light feature
customer_reviews.author: Brooke L.

customer_reviews.title: grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: if you have small ones that like Legos and robots these are great at least until they discover Mindstorm
customer_reviews.author: D Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: This was one of our grandsons birthday gifts and it was a big hit. He loves LEGO’s And this was a nice addition to his collection.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Chandler

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this set! it is cute and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Toniko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 yr old grandson loved it. Spent the entire weekend playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: My sons loved this, their favorite XMAS gift, if you've got tech minded wee ones you should try this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian God

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for any little boy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew. He loves it and loves that you can build different things with it. The little light makes it extra fun!
customer_reviews.author: SRogers

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any collection.
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson has quite a few of them. He assembled it in a short time. Always good quality and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little robot design. Wish Lego would make more robot designs. Grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Olives' Branch

customer_reviews.title: If kids like robots and Legos they will LOVE thus
customer_reviews.text: This LEGO robot is awesome. I bought if for the kids as a Christmas present. It took them about an hour to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like
customer_reviews.text: Took a lot oftime to assemle. Can't play with it - falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Maria L.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old for Christmas who loves Legos and robots. He loved this and the little light it shines.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for one of my niece's sons and he loved it. Really cute.
customer_reviews.author: D. Corning

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kit
customer_reviews.text: My first grader was bugging be about getting one after seeing in WalMart. Ordered one for Christmas. He was able to assemble it the same day by himself.
customer_reviews.author: T. Macauley

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy...
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hard for 6 year old who does these Lego toys all the time. He loved it tho when it was finished
customer_reviews.author: Momsrite

customer_reviews.title: Lego Product
customer_reviews.text: Product was smaller than expected....however I may not have zero'd in on the size. Lego quality. Will be given as gift. Boxed and presented well.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Judy

customer_reviews.title: My son loves legos and robots.  double win
customer_reviews.text: Keep an eye on the tracks. They are experimental for lego at this point. They work amazingly!!!! The only reason for the 4 instead of 5 star rating is that you can't find the tracks anywhere else except this set and maybe one or two others. KEEP TRACK OF THE TRACKS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Vanderloop

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!!
customer_reviews.text: Our bases this as a Christmas gift for my grandson. He loves it and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: GMa Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Kid loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Kid loved it. There is a mistake in the instruction that led to some rework. Good tool to teach the kid if the adult catches on.
customer_reviews.author: WeegieB

customer_reviews.title: Cute LEGO robot
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and so do I. It took a few hours but it was worth it once finished.
customer_reviews.author: Dimples2378

customer_reviews.title: Good LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: I loved this set for my little guy. Picture instructions and multiple build options!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Niemi

customer_reviews.title: Lego is great, this Legoset is for a 7 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Lego is great, this Legoset is for a 7 year old is a great gift with a real light up brick
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my nephew but I got to do ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew but I got to do the honors of putting it together. It brought out the 6 year old in me!! If legos weren't so freaking expensive this would be my new hobby.

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it . Christmas gift . Put together nice . Arrived on time .

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons' friend's birthday and he loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was my Grandsons Christmas gift. He loves all things lego.

customer_reviews.title: fun to put together with offspring
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice economical kit. I love anything with tracks.

customer_reviews.title: We will soon find out, xmas prez
customer_reviews.text: Came in like 1.5 days! I ordered for my son as an xmas present. I figured he would love putting together his very own robot!
customer_reviews.author: Chucklyduckly

customer_reviews.title: Big winner with my 7 year-old grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was happy to receive this as a birthday gift. I am pleased that he will learn while having fun. Wish they had Lego sets like this when I was a kid!
customer_reviews.author: Zhanna

customer_reviews.title: Replay Value
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent because if its ability to make multiple models with the same variety of bricks. This not only gives variety, but stimulates creativity and exploration as the builder experiments with trying to build more than just what's described by the plans.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong w Legos and this 1 has a light!

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with boys 8 & 11
customer_reviews.text: Robots and stuff? Very fun for my boys, and maybe for yours.

customer_reviews.title: Easy build and fun to play
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome set. Easy to build. Love the light brick. My son started to play with it right away.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Sturdy product and fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We like the 3-in-1s
customer_reviews.text: Fun for 7-yr-old. A bargain. Small and quick build. But you do know, it’s not actually a robot...
customer_reviews.author: Helpful

customer_reviews.title: Nephew liked it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift. Nephew liked it. Not sure if easy or hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Madrigal

customer_reviews.title: Fun for hours
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. The light up flash light is so cool.
customer_reviews.author: D Slinger

product_meta.title: LEGO Creator Robo Explorer 31062 Robot Toy
product_meta.description: Impress your friends with this awesome robot toy! this characterful Robo Explorer features an azure, black and gray color scheme, bright-green eyes, working tracks, rotating body and head, and posable arms with working claw and searchlight. Rebuild this 3-in-1 LEGO Creator 6175250 into a robot dog with a light-up jet pack or a robot bird with light-up eyes!
feature_bullets: Robo Explorer robot toy features bright-green eyes, working tracks, rotating body and head, and posable arms with working claw and searchlight
3-in-1 model: rebuilds into a robot dog with a light-up jetpack or a robot bird with light-up eyes with the lego light brick

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars877 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
